content:
The THON executive committee reveal the theme for THON  Igniting Hope Within at the  Homecoming parade on Friday October   PERIOD

This weekend Penn State students will have the chance to take part in a cool new way to raise money for THON PERIOD

CryoZone a facility located in Victory Sports that provides Cryotherapy sessions to people will host a FreezeATHON weekend fundraiser for the Penn State Interfraternity Council Panhellenic Dance Marathon PERIOD

Tyler Smith CryoZone owner and Penn State alumnus described Cryotherapy as a surprisingly powerful form of cold therapy for the body PERIOD

Smith said a typical Cryotherapy session lasts for  minutes and requires standing in a chamber with an open top that uses subzero temperatures from nitrogen gas to lower the skin temperature rapidly and provide health benefits to the body PERIOD

Cryotherapy is a great way to accelerate the recovery of muscles boost energy and reduce inflammation Smith said PERIOD It also is a great way to burn calories and is great for the skin. the therapy is used by a wide range of clients Smith said and is probably best known for its use by numerous professional sports teams and celebrities like Jessica Alba and Jennifer Aniston PERIOD

Smith said everyday people use the therapy to decrease joint or arthritic pain and rejuvenate their body in three minutes PERIOD

You feel so refreshed and energized Smith said PERIOD Its amazing how good you feel after just one session. smith said the idea to have a THON fundraiser came from some of the staff who are Penn State students involved with THON PERIOD

Stephanie McNamara is on a dancer relations committee and said the fundraiser is a great way for students to try something new while donating to a cause close to their hearts. mcNamara seniorkinesiology said she would describe the experience as a painless icebath and encouraged students to try something different that has beneficial results PERIOD

A lot of people say that after theyve done it once the feel more energized and sleep better McNamara said PERIOD We even had a client with an ACL injury who saw a significant decrease in swelling after a couple of sessions. smith said a three minute session costs  and  percent of the proceeds will go directly to THON from CryoZone PERIOD

He said the riskfactors for a person who could not participate in cryotherapy would be present for those who have a history of heart disease or a hypersensitivity to the cold PERIOD

Bree Gidner who works at CryoZone and is a member of Gamma Phi Beta encouraged students to try the innovative new therapy to raise money for THON PERIOD

Its a win win Gidner seniorpsychology said PERIOD You can benefit yourself while also benefitting a great cause. the fundraiser will be ongoing from Nov PERIOD  to  at the CryoZone facility inside Victory Sports PERIOD

Fundraising will be going from  p.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD on Friday  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD on Saturday and  p.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD on Sunday PERIOD
